casebody.data:
Annie Weintraute and Alex Weintraute d. b. a. vs. Henrietta Solomon, p. b. r. Sussex County. April Term, 1894. Judgment.—A joint judgment cannot be entered on a several warrant of attorney. Certiorari.—Judgment was entered before a justice of the peace on a note with warrant of attorney to confess judgment. Bacon, for the appellant,

filed an exception to the record in that the judgment was joint against two, while the authority to confess judgment was single. Seal vs. Seal, 1 Houst. 516.

B. 0. White, for the respondent.

The exception was sustained and judgment reversed.
